
```{r}
data <- read.csv("./collisions1.csv")
```


```{r}
subset_data <- data[!is.na(data$NUMBER.OF.PERSONS.KILLED) & !is.na(data$BOROUGH), ]

size_of_subset <- object.size(subset_data)
size_of_data <- object.size(data)
first_100_rows <- head(data, 100)
write.csv(first_100_rows, file = "subset_100_rows.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
